name: George Orwell
bio: George Orwell was an English novelist and essayist, journalist and critic.

name: J.K. Rowling
bio: J.K. Rowling is a British author, best known for writing the Harry Potter fantasy series.

name: J.R.R. Tolkien
bio: J.R.R. Tolkien was an English writer, poet, philologist, and academic, best known for The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings.

name: Harper Lee
bio: Harper Lee was an American novelist widely known for To Kill a Mockingbird.

name: F. Scott Fitzgerald
bio: F. Scott Fitzgerald was an American novelist and short story writer, widely regarded as one of the greatest American writers of the 20th century.
